sentence.idiomatic: Say something about how you've been. I've been all right recently.
Take a look at this set of furniture. If it's good, we'll buy this set.
Listen to what Mr. Li says. Maybe he has good ideas.
Where did Mr. Zhang go? He went to an appointment.
Mr. Wang would like to ask Ms. Li out to eat, but Ms. Li already has an appointment.
Is this a date or a meeting? We're on a date.
This work is not only difficult to do, but there's also a lot of it.
Not only Asians, but also Europeans like drinking tea.
This book is not only useful, but also interesting.
Miss Wang and Miss Li are good friends. Miss Wang's personality is extroverted, and Miss Li's is introverted.
How is her personality? Her personality is pretty good; she's quite easy to get along with.
His job performance is great, but he doesn't have a good personality.
I remember Mr. Wang's address.
Do you remember where we put Mr. Li's bag?
Mr. Zhang doesn't remember that we have a meeting this morning.
Mr. Zhang broke up with his girlfriend last week.
Did Ms. Sun's boyfriend break up with her, or did Ms. Sun break up with her boyfriend? Ms. Sun was the one who initiated the breakup. She dumped him.
Do you know where Miss Wang went afterwards? I don't know. Since I left her at the intersection, I haven't contacted her.
Are Mr. Wang and Ms. Zhang still together? They're not together anymore. Mr. Wang is now Ms. Zhang's ex-boyfriend.
That person standing on Mrs. Wang's right is her second ex-husband.
Look how pretty Mr. Li's wife is! She's now Mr. Li's ex-wife. They divorced yesterday.
Mr. Zhang's lateness is not due to a traffic jam. He is late because he got up late.
Ms. Li is precisely the best choice to do this job.
Why are you always down on Ms. Wang?
How is your new boss? He's a very serious person.
A good teacher mustn't be too serious, but also can't be completely unserious.
Mr. Li is very serious about his work, and very friendly to co-workers.
Ms. Li's new boyfriend is not bad, since he's so funny.
What kind of girl do you like? I like cheerful girls.
In that group of girls, which is Ms. Wang's little sister? That especially lively one is her.
Tell me about your date last night. How did it go?
It was great. I really like this girl. Not only is she beautiful, but she has a great personality.
Yeah. I remember you broke up with your last girlfriend because she was too severe.
That’s right. I’m looking for a girl who is funny and outgoing.
